what: Applied Statistical Methods in Animal Science
title: Applied Statistical Methods in Animal Science - Spring Semester 2022
text: Genomic selection currently method choice improving genetic potential selection candidates livestock breeding programs. lecture introduces reason regression used genomic selection. Alternatives regression analysis suitable genomic selection presented. concepts introduced illustrated excersises R. students familiar properties multiple linear regression able analyse simple data sets using regression methods. students know multiple linear regression used genomic selection. students know statistical methods used genomic selection, BLUP-based approaches, Bayesian procedures LASSO. students able solve simple exercise problems using statistical framework R.
